system.sustained: Farseer makes Focus Power Test against target and all living beings within 2m x Psy Rating of target, +2m per Degree of Success on Focus Power Test. Anyone hit tajes 3d10 + Psy Rating Energy damage with Penetration 8 and is knocked prone. This attack can be dodged as an area of effect ranged attack. Targets are consumed in a corona of energy and crackling lightning.
